org.postgresql.pljava

Interface SavepointListener


  • public interface SavepointListener
    Interface for a listener to be notified of the start and commit or abort of savepoints. To receive such notifications, implement this interface, with the three methods that will be called in those three cases, and pass an instance to Session.addSavepointListener(org.postgresql.pljava.SavepointListener). SavepointListener exposes a PostgreSQL-specific function that is more internal than the documented SPI.
    Author:
    Thomas Hallgren
